alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Grady; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 10:18PM CDT until July 07 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Northern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Western Grady County in central Oklahoma... Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1017 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Alfalfa to 4 miles southwest of Boone to near Meers, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Anadarko, Elgin, Carnegie, Apache, Fletcher, Cyril, Mountain View, Sterling, Fort Cobb, Verden, Cement, Medicine Park, Gracemont, Norge, Meers, Boone, Albert, Lake Chickasha, and Lake Lawtonka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
